tier.item: (1) neko ip-piki, inu ni-hiki, buta go-hiki, zenbu de hap-piki o katte imasu.
cat 1-hiki dog 2-hiki pig 5-hiki all LOC 8-hiki ACC raising be.
'I'm raising one cat, two dogs, five pigs, eight animals in all.'

(15) Tanaka-san no apaato wa futa-ma shika arimasen
Tanaka-HON GEN apartment TOP 2-ma but not.exist
'Mr./Ms. Tanaka's apartment has only two rooms.'
